Class.name: Custom.QUESTIONNAIREQWT
Class.ViewQuery: SELECT ID AS ROWID, Q1 AS PatientLikelyToHaveASelfCareProblem, Q2 AS PatientLivesAloneOrInAnIsolatedArea, Q3 AS CaringResponsibilitiesForOthers, Q4 AS PatientUsedServicesBeforePresentation, Q5 AS PatientEligibleForHITH, Q6 AS ServicesRequiredAtTimeOfInitialGeneralAssessment, Q7 AS Smoker, Q8 AS HospitilisationInTheLast30Days, Q9 AS DateOfDischarge, QUESDate AS DateUpdated, QUESTime AS TimeUpdated, QUESUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserUpdated, QUESScore AS Score FROM questionnaire.QWT
